name: Jeanine Johnson
text: Excellent never ate anything I haven't liked yet , good food , great staff , prompt delivery service, good customer service on the phone curtious and friendly deals on family meal plans

name: Susie Q LaLonde
text: It was super quick, I called my order in as I was literally 8 minutes away.  My pizza was piping hot and prepared to perfection.  Great selection of food not to mention more crust and pizzas than I am used to along with calzones subs and many other great sounding items.  5 ***** for sure not to mention the prices are fantastic!

name: Karen Kazor
text: Order arrived right around the estimated time. Contactless delivery, as requested. Pizza was as ordered and very fresh and delicious. Best delivery we've had in months. Thank you!!

name: Steven Murphy
text: Order pizzas online with the deal to get a med for a $1 pizzas. Delivered to rong place than they charge me again and didnt take the discount off to re deliver my pizzas mane dont know if this buffalo pizza is even close to worth $50 warning to all do not order from the davison location

name: Steve Graska
text: Awful service said 25 minute wait. Showed up after 30 minutes just to be told another 30 minutes then the manager had nothing bit an attitude saying there is nothing she can do! While my wife and kids are in the car and my 1 year old is screaming. I will never go back and suggest you don't either!

name: Paul Kilgore
text: The last three times I have ordered from there have been a disaster.  Delivery never came,  quoted wrong specials,  and 45 minutes for a small pizza. Avoid the Davison location if at all possible.

name: Thomas Wiedner
text: Cold pizza. Rude staff. Incompetent delivery driver. Won't ever orded from here again.

name: Zachary Tye
text:
Just ordered wings from here.
have not had issues in the past, but most of the wings in my box are smaller than my thumb. Would not reccomend

text: Good pizza...friendly staff.

name: Alex Bernard
text: Horrible customer service. The pizza came as a thin crust as it was not ordered as a thin crust and their answer was it's a new dough process and it's not working properly. That's fine, atleast tell the customer about it before hand. Then ‚Ä¶More

name: Amy Owen
text: Best pizza around!! Love the customer service at the Davison location super friendly and helpful Everytime. Their delivery people are amazing, I had a large order tonight with extra things and he nailed it got everything correct. üòç Thank you for for everything favorite pizza place by far

name: Ms K. Johnson
text: I ordered a small pizza. I wanted to order a salad and bread with it but he was so dismissive that I only ordered the pizza. He never asked me why I was upset about my last order and could care less about the order I was giving him.I have ‚Ä¶More

name: Marc Howard
text:
Grease? Covered.
Ordered that way? Nope

name: Anthony DiNardi
text: I usually get a small salad here almost every day.  Today I got a large salad.  The only difference between them was that I got a lot more lettuce in the Large salad, but I had the same amount of toppings as in the regular size salad.  Huge rip off.

name: Tracey Fowler
text: Gluten free pizza is tasty! Live the flavored crust too.

name: Nick Wolfe
text: Our favorite pizza place. Always perfect, and everyone is friendly there

name: BABY FREDDY Alexander
text:
Good place for eating ..beats little caesars.
Yaaaa

name: Anthony DiNardi
text: Well, Hungry Howies asked me 4 days ago in my last review to give them a second chance after I gave them 1 Star.  I did.  BAD IDEA!  I ordered my 2 Pizzas and was given a 35 minute wait on them.  After 40 minutes I arrived at the Hungry ‚Ä¶More

name: Allen Ingram
text: The BBQ chicken pizza is amazing!!

name: Amanda Heater
text: At first i just ordered from here cause it was the closest pizza place. Now i order from here all the time!! Love the pizza and the service. Never takes to long on delivery! Satisfied 10/10 times! Love this place.

name: S B
text: Great service. Staff accommodating to food allergies. Order always on time and correct.

name: Tom Ato
text: Friendly and fast service

name: Linda Lincoln
text: Everyone had a very good time.

name: H P
text: First I ordered online and my time said 25 minutes delivery and after an hour  I called and they said no it was a pickup order so we had to wait for delivery another 20 minutes.When we got our food the breadsticks tasted like they were sitting for a week and got reheated they were awful.Wont be back to this location again.

name: Amanda faye
text: We called and placed a carry out order. We were told there was a deal 6 large pizzas for $40 and added on 4 two liters of pop for a total of $63. The order would be ready in 25 minutes. When we arrived they said they had no record of our ‚Ä¶More

name: _ TheLegend27 _
text: The pizza is very good! Flavored crust, good bread sticks, cheese bread, even brownies! Every kind of food you would want on a Friday night can be gotten here with affordable prices and extremely friendly employees!!

name: dora wright
text: Quick and yummy

name: Aaron McEachern
text: They deliver to a larger area than most pizza delivery in the area.

text: Love their subs and salads

name: Roblox Email
text: had a 25 minute wait that turned into over an hr absolutely ridiculous

text: Great food & service!!!

name: Robert Link
text: This place is a disaster. Hopefully, the owner will see this and step up his training program before the health department shuts them down. We ordered two subs and a salad for carryout. Subs were ready a few minutes after we arrived. We ‚Ä¶More

text: Hungry. Howies. Tastes good. Fair prices.

text: I called in a huge order on a Tuesday right as they opened and the staff was a little on edge about it because usually they need a 24 hour heads up for really big orders but they took care of it anyway and had a good attitude about it! I ‚Ä¶More

text: Crust wasnt baked long enough and overpriced for a 4 item Large pizza.

Polite and accomidanit.  Delicious hot food
and prompt service. This is Howie do it!

name: Bigblu Blue
text: Very pleased with my order and deals offered

name: Jason
text: Not even enough steak to cover the bread! 3 times the lettuce compared to meat! Every time I order howie's it takes a hour & a half, the order is wrong, they "forgot" something &/or the food is horrible! Your subs & pizza suck! Your whole organization needs an overhaul!

name: Destini Kelly
text: Used the app to order for delivery, and they dont deliver 4 miles away. They called and said they dont deliver this far .

text: Quality didn't taste that well. It also took over an hour to get pizza.

name: Gage Fenner
text: I got the Chicken Bacon Ranch Sub, 2 hours later after eating I got food poisoning and it came back out both ends.... never going to Davison location again.

name: Lindsay Crawford
text: This used to be my favorite pizza until they changed their crust and it's no longer soft and fluffy; now it's dry and cardboard-like and there's hardly any seasoning on the crust. They have also become stingy with the sauce and toppings. I'm disappointed

name: Ryan Ashmore
text: They suck we order 30 minutes away from there and still had to wait 10 minutes dont like going there would wather drive a extra 20 minutes
